reviews.review: I can not play just because someone reported me as a hacker, well in fact I never used one.
It is a very fun game get it if you are looking for a competitive and fun fps.
ГАВНО В КОТОРОЕ Я ПРОЕБАЛ ВРЕМЯ НО ЛЮБЛЮ ЭТУ ИГРУ
Ce jeu demande une grande maîtrise ce qui le rend tres dur

Hackers fill the game like grass fills a grass field. TLDR, The game is great, even after so many years, the constant updates and patches makes the game bearably enjoyable. Bearably because the hackers in the game are just creating havoc for players who actually wish to genuinely enjoy the game. 
CS:GO would be one of the best FPS game in the market if not for the hackers. 

But hey it's free now, so install it and see for yourself how shit the game is in its current state.

This game is amazing but prepare to get very frustrated because most people who play are absolutely ridiculous and know every square inch of every map and it's very crazy trying to compete against them. A lot of people have been playing for something like 20 years. Insane! Amazing graphics, amazing gameplay, very fun when things go your way. Highly recommend getting into it.
последние 2 года на прайме читер в каждой катке

F2P completely ruined it. 872 hrs on record and matchmaking is trash. Still at least 1 cheater in half the comp games I'm in. Fun game, but it's just going to be hacker vs. hacker from now on. I think I'm actually done with it now. Fr I won 9 games in a row and didn't rank up, but I lose 3 and rank down? Valve please fix. I won't be playing anymore until the cheaters are gone, which is probably going to be never since the board behind the game decided to make it possible to buy prime. Just a cash grab. But hey, cool skins! Now taxable!

그거는 생각 하고 하셔야 합니다. 그리고 이게임을 할 생각이시라면 브레이킹과 스프레이 연습은 필수 입니다. 그래야 게임을 제대로 즐기실 수 있으실겁니다. 그럼 good game 하십시오~^^7
